name: Intern of The Devil
description:
!Tip! : Burning/burnt objects don't earn you points when you blow them up, but after blowing up the objects, they still give points when burning.

You were desperate to get an internship, and ended up at the devil's workplace! On your first day you're given some of his workload, releasing chaos upon the world!!!

Mouse to click

Q and E for turning the camera

Space to pause/call menu

Made for Brackey's GameJam 2021

As for this gamejam I decided to spend more time on the game rather than wrestle with 3d modelling, shoutout to all the models I used:

https://www.vecteezy.com/free-vector/vector Vectors by Vecteezy
